_header: Yissing and glozing and fellowship been rive
_description: The reply of the oracle on the Sins of the Time — three couplets

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Ȝissinge and glosinge and felsship beon riueluþer lustes
                    ouer floten wiþ fals gile and strifhardnesse and bakbiting wiþ
                    scornes out lestenSote almis dede and trouþe wiþ semli plei
                    þei restenvnkindenesse vnkunninges vnclannesse beon arerdso
                    þat harmes þei boden as ich am aferd
BLHar7322.Note: Written as prose. Underscored in rubric.
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
